text:
Shipamax (YC W17)| London | ONSITE

Shipamax develops software for bulk shipping companies to manage their business. Booking a ship is currently done manually using pen, paper, phone and email. It can take 2+ weeks to book a ship. Shipamax uses AI and machine learning to help shipowners and brokers streamline their processes.

Software Engineer (backend focus)

Senior Software Engineer (backend focus)

Data Scientist / NLP specialist

more here: https://angel.co/shipamax
